qa_pairs.question: Am I permitted to carry electronic and electrical devices, such as laptops, MP3 players, or portable DVD players?
qa_pairs.answer: For example, it is prohibited to carry electronic skateboards with batteries in the hold. Prior to putting these into the hold, the batteries should be removed from the skateboard, and assessed individually. To avoid this, we recommend that you review the current security restrictions at http://web.shgm.gov.tr/tr/yolcular-icin/3889-index (http://web.shgm.gov.tr/tr/yolcular-icin/3889-index).

qa_pairs.question: Where can I store my baggage?
qa_pairs.answer:
The updated 2024 rates for baggage lockers on the Domestic and International Arrivals Floor are shown below:
Small-sized Bag (duty-free): TRY 90 for 24 hours,
Medium-sized Baggage (cabin-sized bag): TRY 115 for 24 hours,
Large-sized Baggage (Maximum size hold baggage): TRY 240 for 24 hours,
XL-sized Baggage (TV, surfboard, bicycle, etc.): TRY 300 for 24 hours.
XXL-sized Baggage: TRY 375 for 24 hours.
The updated 2024 price structure for baggage lockers, located at Gates 1 and 6 on the Departures Floor, is as follows:
Small size: TRY 90 for 24 hours,
Medium size: TRY 115 for 24 hours,
Large size: TRY 240 for 24 hours,
XL size: TRY 300 for 24 hours,
You can access the location of these areas using our airport map (Airport Map (https://www.istairport.com/en/airport/maps/airport-map/)) or by using the Istanbul Airport mobile application.

qa_pairs.question: Does the airport offer a porter service?
qa_pairs.answer: Porters are also available to assist passengers at the baggage claim area in the arrivals zone.

qa_pairs.question: Do the parking areas offer designated parking spaces for passengers with disabilities?
qa_pairs.answer:
Accessible toilets are also available in the parking area.
Once you have parked your car in the parking area:
you can access Gate 1 from the turquoise parking lot, floor P5,
Gates 1 and 3 from the purple parking lot, floor P5,
and Gate 7 from the red and blue parking lot, floor P5, using the moving walkway.
In accordance with the parking fees and application principles of the Public Private Cooperation (PPP) tariff published by the General Directorate of State Airports Authority (DHMI); disabled guests who wish to use our parking facility free of charge for up to a maximum of 15 days, are required to be in the vehicle in person and be able to present the documents proving their disability (disabled identity card issued by the relevant ministry, disability report or disabled registered vehicle license issued in their name).
[YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/ODFJtt4qFBw)]

qa_pairs.question: Are disabled passengers entitled to complimentary parking facilities?
qa_pairs.answer: [YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/CAIwHVe72Aw)]

qa_pairs.question: Does the airport provide an accessible route for visually-impaired passengers?
qa_pairs.answer:
Similarly, the accessible route extends from the international and domestic baggage claim areas to the arrivals area exit and entry points.
The accessible route is a sophisticated application featuring tactile paving and available in the domestic departures area of the terminal and was designed to assist visually-impaired passengers to travel independently through the airport.
The accessible route conveniently extends towards the check-in counters, the second security checkpoint and the boarding gates through entrance gates 1 or 3. The accessible route features a single-lane tactile surface, extending along a primary route with specialized warning surfaces to indicate boarding gates and restroom areas. The 'Loud Steps' feature in the maps section of the iGA Istanbul Airport mobile app, offers voice guidance to assist you in navigating your route in the airport, and to receive information about your surroundings, by holding your phone in the direction you'd like to go.
[YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/H1s8DaEUs_Q)]

qa_pairs.answer:

qa_pairs.question: How can I apply for the Very Special Guest Card offered through the Accessible Airport program?
qa_pairs.answer:
At the Information Desks: Complete and submit the application form at the Information Desks, together with a photograph and medical report.
Website: The application form can be completed on our website, where you can also upload your photograph and medical report.
[YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/3IFZSvSoBJI)]

qa_pairs.question: Where do I collect the Very Special Guest Card offered under the Accessible Airport program?
qa_pairs.answer: [YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/79sEuaCi79w)]

qa_pairs.question: What services am I entitled to with the Very Special Guest Card?
qa_pairs.answer:
If you wish to use the Buggy shuttle service, please present your Very Special Guest Card to the staff at the Buggy stops. The Very Special Guest card entitles you and one companion to enjoy complimentary Buggy shuttle service.
[YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/6oQnu22Cunw)]

qa_pairs.question: What facilities does the Very Special Guest Room offer?

qa_pairs.question: What is the seating capacity of the Very Special Guest room?

qa_pairs.question: Does iGA Istanbul Airport offer priority services for elderly passengers?
qa_pairs.answer:
Guests can take advantage of the iGA Premium Services to reserve a staff assistant to accompany them through the airport, by making a reservation through the iGA Meet & Greet section on the igapass.com website, or by contacting our call center. Passengers aged 65+ are eligible for a 35% discount when using the iGA Meet and Greet Service.
The iGA Sleepod is located beyond the international passport control area, and immediately in front of Gate D. Passengers over the age of 65 are eligible for a 35% discount when booking the iGA Sleepod sleeping cabins.

qa_pairs.question: What services are provided for passengers with invisible disabilities, such as dementia or Alzheimer's disease, who may require a quieter waiting area?
qa_pairs.answer:
For passengers who require a calmer atmosphere, Special Passenger Service Points are provided at check-in islands B and M.
Passengers with invisible conditions such as dementia, autism, and anxiety disorder, and those who need additional support or a special welcome, can collect a complimentary Sunflower Lanyard from our Information Desks.

qa_pairs.question: Will I have access to a wheelchair at the airport?
qa_pairs.answer: Family members of passengers who require a wheelchair at the airport, can find these at the Information Desks near to the passport control area.

qa_pairs.question: I want to travel with my own wheelchair, how do I get to/from the airport?
qa_pairs.answer: Passengers who prefer to use the HAVAİST accessible midibuses to travel to the city center, can find the HAVAİST contact details in the airport terminal, or they can notify the HAVAİST staff situated on the transportation floor of the airport. Passengers traveling from the airport to the city center, must reserve transportation at least one hour in advance; passengers traveling from the city center to the airport, must make a reservation at least six hours in advance. Email: info@hava.ist (mailto:info@hava.ist) - Call center: 0850 888 33 34 (tel:08508883334)

qa_pairs.question: What lounges are available at Istanbul Airport? How can I take advantage of these services?
qa_pairs.answer:
The THY Domestic CIP Lounge can be accessed by THY business class passengers and Frequent Flyer cardholders in the domestic area, while the International Turkish Airlines Lounge can be accessed by Star Alliance business class passengers and Frequent Flyer cardholders in the international area of Istanbul Airport. The SkyTeam Lounge, serving SkyTeam member airlines, is available to guests in the international area.
Lounge locations can be accessed on the airport map (Airport Map (https://www.istairport.com/en/airport/maps/airport-map/)) or via our Istanbul Airport mobile application.

qa_pairs.question: Where are the Buggy stops located?
qa_pairs.answer:
The Buggy service offers four departure points, with three in the international area, and one in the domestic area.
International area: North Stop - located at the bottom of the stairs, near Gate D in the international departures area.
West stop: opposite Gate C1 on the International Departures floor.
East stop: opposite Gate E1 on the International Departures floor.
In the domestic area:
Domestic area stop - directly opposite the stairs, on the lower level, in the domestic departures area.
To make use of the Buggy shuttle service, please go to the Buggy stops, which can be found on the map on the Istanbul Airport mobile application.
The available services are as follows
International area, western route and International area, eastern route, towards international boarding gates A, B, C, E, and F,
International area, northern route, towards international boarding gate D,
Domestic area Buggy stop towards the domestic boarding gate,
Choose the relevant Buggy stop based on which boarding gate you need to go to.

qa_pairs.question: How do I purchase a ticket for the Buggy service?
qa_pairs.answer:
www.igapass.com (https://www.igapass.com/en),
the Istanbul Airport mobile application,
iGA Buggy Stations, and
iGA Pass Service and Sales Points at the airport.

qa_pairs.question: Where can I find information about the iGA Meet and Greet service?
qa_pairs.answer:
For departing passengers;
Airport assistant
Porter service
Priority check-in
iGA Fast Track service
Escort to aircraft door
Use of iGA Lounge
Buggy reserved for the passenger
For arriving passengers:
Airport assistant
Porter service
Buggy reserved for the passenger
iGA Fast Track service
Escort to the transfer vehicle
For transfer passengers:
Met by a personal assistant at the arrivals gate (on a designated Buggy)
Porter service
Use of iGA Fast Track at the passport control point
Access to the iGA Lounge
Escort to the departure flight gate (on a designated Buggy)
Service and package fees can be accessed through the https://igapass.com website or the İstanbul Airport mobile application.

qa_pairs.question: How can I book the iGA Meet and Greet service?
qa_pairs.answer:
Reservations for the iGA Meet and Greet service can be made on:
www.igapass.com (https://www.igapass.com/en?locale=en),
the Istanbul Airport mobile application,
at reservation@igapass.com (mailto:reservation@igapass.com) and
at the iGA Pass Service and Sales Point located at the airport.
Reservations for the iGA Meet and Greet service should be made at least 24 hours in advance. Reservations made less than 24 hours prior to departure or arrival, will not be processed.

qa_pairs.question: How can I access the iGA Fast Track service?
qa_pairs.answer: In addition, if you are traveling with one of our partner airlines, or you are a customer of one of our affiliates, or if your airline offers access to this service, you will be eligible to use our iGA Fast Track Service.

qa_pairs.question: Where are iGA Fast Track points located?
qa_pairs.answer:
Departure passengers: at the terminal entrance doors, entrance 1 for domestic flights, entrances 3 and 7 for international flights and at the security checkpoints.
At the passport checkpoints for international arrivals, international departures and transfer passengers.

qa_pairs.question: Does the airport offer complimentary Wi-Fi?
qa_pairs.answer:
Access via SMS:
Click on mobile access.
Select the flag corresponding to your country code and enter your telephone number without the area code. Accept the agreement and click on 'Enter'.
Enter the SMS code that is sent to your cell phone, and then click on Continue.
Access with Passport Number:
Use the kiosk to verify your passport details, and take note of the code generated that you will use as your password.
Connect to the airport Wi-Fi on your phone and select 'Enter with Passport' on the displayed page.
Enter your passport number and the code received from the kiosk. Accept the agreement and select 'Enter'.
Find the Wi-Fi kiosks by accessing our website or using the map feature on the iGA Istanbul Airport mobile application.
If you encounter any issues using the Wi-Fi service, support is available on
444 01 45 (tel:+904440145).
[YouTube video: (https://www.youtube.com/embed/C9_yj0SQg4Q)]

qa_pairs.question: Why is an SMS required to access the complimentary Wi-Fi service?
qa_pairs.answer:
Use the kiosk to verify your passport details, and take note of the code generated that you will use as your password.
Connect to the airport Wi-Fi on your phone and select 'Enter with Passport' on the displayed page.
Enter your passport number and the code received from the kiosk. Accept the agreement and select 'Enter'.

qa_pairs.question: How do I use the Wi-Fi service, if my roaming service is inactive?
qa_pairs.answer:
Use the kiosk to verify your passport details, and take note of the code generated that you will use as your password.
Connect to the airport Wi-Fi on your phone and select 'Enter with Passport' on the displayed page.
Enter your passport number and the code received from the kiosk. Accept the agreement and select 'Enter'.
